author: Special Correspondent
text:
There will be power shutdown in the following places between 9 a.m. and 2 p.m. on January 12 due to maintenance work to be undertaken by the Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation at its sub-stations:

Sholavandan

Sholavandan, Thachampaththu, Tiruvedakam, Melakkal, Kachirairuppu, Narayanapuram, Oothukuli, Thenkarai, Mullipallam, Mannadimangalam, Kadhupatti, Prumbadi, Alankottaram, Rishabam and Rayapuram.

Samayanallur

Samayanallur, Thenur, Thodaneri, Sathiyamoorthy Nagar, Vairavanatham, Nagari, Adalai, Ganapathy Nagar, Visalakshi Mill Colony, Visthara, Paravai Main Road, Mangayarkarasi College, Paravai, Pothumbu, Alanganallur, T. Mettupatti, Oorseri, Vavidamarudhur and Vilangudi Market.
title: Power shutdown on January 12
